properties.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Kern County Desert; Tehachapi Area
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 1:52AM PST until January 22 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Sustained west winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts around 55
mph expected.

* WHERE...A portion of the Kern County mountains and desert.

* WHEN...Valid from 3 PM PST this afternoon until 9 AM PST
Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Strong wind gusts may blow down tree limbs and power lines. A
few power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult,
particularly for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not
limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 below Walker Pass, and
Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: A WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY MORNING
